structure.unit: Medical Malpractice Self Insurance Trust Funds

law.catch_line: Revocation Or Suspension Of Certification Of Fund; Removal Of Trustee

text.section: violating any provision of this chapter or any regulations promulgated hereunder;
presenting false or misleading statements on any document which is filed in accordance with this chapter;
holding a claims reserve less than the minimum required to be maintained by section eight;
using improper accounting procedures not in conformity with section seven.
